text: @narendramodi Why don't you let some people actually work? Why do you waste so much bandwidth and force them to see your yucky face for hours together? Unless #radarbaba is the expert on #Coronavirus too. I hope you did not share any of your ideas "Mujhe laga ki aisa Karne se waisa hoga..."
